results.title: Therapeutic Effects of Metformin on Central Nervous System Diseases: A Focus on Protection of Neurovascular Unit.
results.text_hl: Since it rapidly penetrates the blood-brain barrier (BBB) and accumulates in the brain, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ also has an extensively studied neuronal protective effect in @<m>DISEASE_Motor_Neuron_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D016472 @@@neuronal diseases@@@.
